page.title: 15Employment in Brookmans Park
page.content: Apart from a few local shops there is no employment in the village itself.There is really nobody without work here as all the people in the village have very expensive houses and run expensive cars. We did a survey and found that most of the people work in London. We looked through the school's list of what fathers did for a living (father's occupation) and found many were company directors, lawyers,doctors,bankers and stockbrokers. There were also one or two shopkeepers who have shops in the village. If people do lose their jobs they do not stay here but move away. There are some retired people who live in the village. Most of them have lived here all their lives and have not moved away after finishing work.
